name: Indian Institute of Technology Patna
overview: One of the new IITs established in 2008, rapidly growing in research and placements.

courses.name: B.Tech (CSE, AI & Data Science, EEE, Mech, Civil, Chem, Meta)

name: National Institute of Technology Patna
overview: The 18th NIT created by the Ministry of Education, formerly Bihar College of Engineering (est. 1886).

name: Indian Institute of Management Bodh Gaya
overview: One of the new generation IIMs, focusing on mindful management and sustainable business practices.

name: All India Institute of Medical Sciences Patna
overview: Premier medical institute and hospital established under PMSSY to correct regional imbalances in healthcare.

name: Chanakya National Law University
overview: A premier National Law University in Bihar dedicated to legal education.

name: Central University of South Bihar
overview: Central university accredited with NAAC 'A++' grade, offering integrated and PG courses.

courses.name: M.Sc (Biotech, Bioinformatics, Env Science, Life Science)

name: Nalanda University
overview: An international university reviving the ancient Nalanda tradition, focusing on Asian studies, ecology, and history.

name: Dr. Rajendra Prasad Central Agricultural University
overview: A central agricultural university with a rich history in agricultural research.

name: Indian Institute of Information Technology Bhagalpur
overview: Institute of National Importance operating under PPP mode, mentored by IIT Guwahati.

name: Patna University
overview: The 7th oldest university in the Indian subcontinent, known for its historical significance.

name: Patna Women's College (Autonomous)
overview: Premier autonomous college for women, affiliated with Patna University, NAAC 'A' grade.

name: Indira Gandhi Institute of Medical Sciences
overview: An autonomous medical institute on the pattern of AIIMS, offering super-specialty care.

name: Patna Medical College and Hospital
overview: The oldest and largest medical college in Bihar (est. 1925).

name: Nalanda Medical College and Hospital
overview: Major government medical college located in Kankarbagh.

name: Darbhanga Medical College and Hospital
overview: Historic medical college serving the Mithila region.

name: Sri Krishna Medical College and Hospital
overview: Key government medical college in North Bihar.

name: National Institute of Pharmaceutical Education and Research Hajipur
overview: Institute of National Importance for pharmaceutical sciences.

name: Bakhtiyarpur College of Engineering
overview: Government engineering college under the Department of Science & Technology, Bihar.

courses.name: B.Tech (CSE, Mech, Civil, EEE, IoT, Fire Tech)

name: Muzaffarpur Institute of Technology
overview: One of the oldest government engineering colleges in Eastern India (est. 1954).

courses.name: B.Tech (Civil, Mech, Electrical, ECE, IT, Leather Tech)

name: Bhagalpur College of Engineering
overview: Premier government engineering institute in the Silk City.

name: Nalanda College of Engineering
overview: Government engineering college in Nalanda district.

name: Gaya College of Engineering
overview: Formerly Magadh Engineering College, now a government institute.

name: Motihari College of Engineering
overview: Government engineering college in East Champaran.

name: Aryabhatta Knowledge University
overview: The affiliating university for technical, medical, and professional education in Bihar.

name: Bihar Animal Sciences University
overview: Specialized university for veterinary and animal sciences.

name: Bihar Agricultural University
overview: State agricultural university with multiple constituent colleges.

name: Chandragupt Institute of Management Patna
overview: Autonomous management institute funded by the Bihar government.

name: Lalit Narayan Mithila University
overview: Major state university serving the Mithila region.

name: Tilka Manjhi Bhagalpur University
overview: State university named after freedom fighter Tilka Manjhi.

name: Magadh University
overview: One of the largest state universities in Bihar.

name: Indian Institute of Technology Patna
overview: NIRF Ranked Engineering Institute

name: National Institute of Technology Patna
overview: NIRF Ranked Engineering Institute
